detail_desc: Relaxed-fit blouse in a crêpe weave with a collar, partially concealed buttons down the front, short dolman sleeves and a yoke with a pleat at the back.
Sleeveless blouse woven in a cotton blend with buttons and pin-tucks with lace insets at the front. Frills down the front and around the armholes and a yoke with a pleat at the back.
Sleeveless blouse woven in a cotton blend with buttons and pin-tucks with lace insets at the front. Frills down the front and around the armholes and a yoke with a pleat at the back.
Blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, a small stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Gathers at the shoulders, a yoke at the back, wide, 3/4-length sleeves and a scalloped hem.
Blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, a small stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Gathers at the shoulders, a yoke at the back, wide, 3/4-length sleeves and a scalloped hem.

Wide blouse in a soft, woven cotton blend with embroidery. Gathered V-neck and ties at the top with tasselled ends, long raglan, puff sleeves with gathers, narrow buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck with sewn-on ties at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck with sewn-on ties at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Straight-cut, off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy cotton weave with elastication at the shoulders, buttons at the front and 3/4-length balloon sleeves with cuffs.
Straight-cut, off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy cotton weave with elastication at the shoulders, buttons at the front and 3/4-length balloon sleeves with cuffs.
Straight-cut, off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy cotton weave with elastication at the shoulders, buttons at the front and 3/4-length balloon sleeves with cuffs.

Blouse in woven fabric with print stripes and a slight sheen. Small stand-up collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves, wide cuffs with a slit, and a rounded hem.
Top in soft velour with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pull-on trousers in a viscose weave with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, side pockets and elasticated hems. One patterned pair.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with worn details, a lined hood, kangaroo pocket, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a gently rounded, raw-edge hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with worn details, a lined hood, kangaroo pocket, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a gently rounded, raw-edge hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with worn details, a lined hood, kangaroo pocket, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a gently rounded, raw-edge hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with worn details, a lined hood, kangaroo pocket, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a gently rounded, raw-edge hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jacket in stretch twill with embroidery at the top, a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, tabs with adjustable buttoning at the back, and buttoned cuffs.

Short blouse in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, seam under the bust and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Opening at the back with covered buttons at the back of the neck and ties at the hem.

V-neck dress in a patterned viscose weave with covered buttons down the front, decorative gathers at the shoulders, short, elasticated puff sleeves with a tie at the cuffs, and high slits at the front and sides. Unlined.

V-neck dress in a patterned viscose weave with covered buttons down the front, decorative gathers at the shoulders, short, elasticated puff sleeves with a tie at the cuffs, and high slits at the front and sides. Unlined.

V-neck dress in a patterned viscose weave with covered buttons down the front, decorative gathers at the shoulders, short, elasticated puff sleeves with a tie at the cuffs, and high slits at the front and sides. Unlined.

V-neck dress in a patterned viscose weave with covered buttons down the front, decorative gathers at the shoulders, short, elasticated puff sleeves with a tie at the cuffs, and high slits at the front and sides. Unlined.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in plumeti chiffon with elastication at the top, long sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Jersey lining.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in plumeti chiffon with elastication at the top, long sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Jersey lining.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in plumeti chiffon with elastication at the top, long sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Jersey lining.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a crinkled weave with smocking at the top and long sleeves with two, bell-shaped flounces. Seam at the hem with a narrow frill and gently flared peplum. Unlined.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a crinkled weave with smocking at the top and long sleeves with two, bell-shaped flounces. Seam at the hem with a narrow frill and gently flared peplum. Unlined.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in cotton poplin with smocking at the top and a sewn-on bow at the back. Long sleeves with smocking and a flounce at the cuffs.
Short-sleeved blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise on the front and sleeves. Collar, buttons down the front and scalloped edges at the sleeves and front hem. Unlined.
Top in patterned sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket ankle-length trousers in stretch twill with embroidery, a regular waist, zip fly and slim, straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Jumpsuit in a stripe-print crinkled weave with elastication at the top and tie-top shoulder straps. Smocked seam at the waist and straight-cut, wide legs.
Jumpsuit in a stripe-print crinkled weave with elastication at the top and tie-top shoulder straps. Smocked seam at the waist and straight-cut, wide legs.
High-waisted, crêpe trousers with a zip in one side and slim legs with sewn-in creases at the front and a flare to the hem.
High-waisted, crêpe trousers with a zip in one side and slim legs with sewn-in creases at the front and a flare to the hem.
Knee-length, short-sleeved dress in woven fabric with a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt.
V-neck blouse in a sturdy weave with a crêpe finish. Short, wide sleeves, two concealed press-studs at the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
V-neck blouse in a sturdy weave with a crêpe finish. Short, wide sleeves, two concealed press-studs at the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Short, fine-knit cardigan in soft cotton with buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with double frills in woven fabric around the armholes.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with double frills in woven fabric around the armholes.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey with smocking that wraps over at the front and extends over at the arms. Loose-fitting style that drapes lightly.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey with smocking that wraps over at the front and extends over at the arms. Loose-fitting style that drapes lightly.
Short shorts in a sturdy jacquard weave with an extended waistband and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Zip fly, side pockets and fake back pockets.
Satin mules with pointed toes. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 6 cm.
Satin mules with pointed toes. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 6 cm.
Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in cotton poplin with a smocked waist and seam at the hem with a lower section in a contrasting colour.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with a small frill trim at the top, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and narrow elastication with a small frill trim at the hems.
Treggings in washed stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and raw-edge hems.
Shirt in woven fabric with a lined, drawstring hood in sweatshirt fabric. Buttons down the front, flap chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shirt in woven fabric with a lined, drawstring hood in sweatshirt fabric. Buttons down the front, flap chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Three necklaces in different widths of metal chain. Adjustable length, 41-48 cm.

Metal hoop earrings in four different sizes ranging from 1 to 1.5 cm.

Joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

V-neck cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, buttons down the front and front pockets. Ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.

3/4-length leggings in sturdy scuba fabric with a sheen. Elasticated waist and sewn-in creases front and back.
Top in airy, patterned chiffon with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck with frills at the top.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a flock print on the front, ribbing around the neckline and slits at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, and concealed double-breasted fastening at the front. Jetted front pockets and a flare to the hem. Lined.
